title: Verdant Citadel
description: You've reached the shore of the Verdant Citadel, a stone bulwark on an island in an endless sea. It is inhabited by undead demonic caretakers who are responsible for keeping blood-thirsty, pain-delivering space marines like you from gaining a foothold. But that's never given you any pause before... Narrative fluff aside, I wanted to get better at non-linear layouts so ended up making this map. It is about as non-linear as I could stand to make it, and as a result there are a few ways to appro...
